tb_v_driver:
`timescale 1ns / 1ps

module top_module_tb;
    reg [4:1] x;
    wire f;
  
    // Instantiate the DUT (device under test)
    top_module DUT (
        .x(x),
        .f(f)
    );

    // Test stimulus
    integer i;
    reg [15:0] test_vectors[15:0]; // Storing test vectors
    reg all_passed = 1; // Flag to check if all test cases passed

    initial begin
        // Define the expected outputs for given inputs x[4:1] from Karnaugh map
        test_vectors[0]  = 16'b0000_0001; // x = 0000, f = 1
        test_vectors[1]  = 16'b0001_0000; // x = 0001, f = 0
        test_vectors[2]  = 16'b0010_0000; // x = 0010, f = 0
        test_vectors[3]  = 16'b0011_0001; // x = 0011, f = 1
        test_vectors[4]  = 16'b0100_0000; // x = 0100, f = 0
        test_vectors[5]  = 16'b0101_0000; // x = 0101, f = 0
        test_vectors[6]  = 16'b0110_0000; // x = 0110, f = 0
        test_vectors[7]  = 16'b0111_0000; // x = 0111, f = 0
        test_vectors[8]  = 16'b1000_0001; // x = 1000, f = 1
        test_vectors[9]  = 16'b1001_0001; // x = 1001, f = 1
        test_vectors[10] = 16'b1010_0001; // x = 1010, f = 1
        test_vectors[11] = 16'b1011_0000; // x = 1011, f = 0
        test_vectors[12] = 16'b1100_0001; // x = 1100, f = 1
        test_vectors[13] = 16'b1101_0001; // x = 1101, f = 1
        test_vectors[14] = 16'b1110_0000; // x = 1110, f = 0
        test_vectors[15] = 16'b1111_0001; // x = 1111, f = 1
        
        // Apply each test vector and check the output
        for (i = 0; i < 16; i = i + 1) begin
            x = test_vectors[i][15:12]; // Set test input
            #10; // Wait for the output to stabilize
            if (f !== test_vectors[i][0]) begin
                all_passed = 0; // Set flag to 0 if any test fails
            end
        end

        if (all_passed) begin
            $display("all test cases passed");
        end

        $finish; // End the simulation
    end
endmodule

`timescale 1ns / 1ps

module tb_top_module; // Testbench module
  
  reg [2:0] vec; // Test vector input
  wire [2:0] outv; // Test output vector
  wire o2, o1, o0; // Separate bit outputs

  // Instantiate the DUT
  top_module DUT (
    .vec(vec),
    .outv(outv),
    .o2(o2),
    .o1(o1),
    .o0(o0)
  );

  // Test variables
  reg [2:0] vec_test;
  integer i;
  integer error_flag;

  initial begin
    error_flag = 0; // Initialize the error flag to 0
    for (i = 0; i < 8; i = i + 1) begin
      vec_test = i; // input test value (0 to 7)
      vec = vec_test; // Drive input
      #10; // Wait for the outputs to stabilize
      
      // Check outputs
      if (outv !== vec || o2 !== vec[2] || o1 !== vec[1] || o0 !== vec[0]) begin
        error_flag = 1; // Set error flag on failure
      end
    end
    
    // Result output based on the test results
    if (error_flag == 0) begin
      $display("all test cases passed");
    end

    $finish; // End the simulation
  end

endmodule
